ctx: intros i L L1 L2 H a H0.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros i L L1 L2 H a H0. induction H. - left. split. + apply (genPcP0 i L). + apply H0. - destruct H0. + destruct H1 as [b [H1 H2]]. left. split. * apply (genPcP1 L L1 L2 L3 a H H0 H1 H2). * apply H3. + right. apply (or_intror (In a L)). apply H1.
